title: Le Saladier Bio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Caribbean, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Salad bar in the commercial center of Genipa with a clean design. Custom make your own salad bowls; the majority of the ingredients are vegan, including veggies, grains, fruits, tofu and more. Pay by weight. Also has fruit juices. Is also a delicatessen and organic market. Ingredients are mainly local, organic and fair trade.
